Nigel Lythgoe says the talent pool is much bigger this season as well, adding, We're going to see a lot of good talent because a lot of good talent came. We saw more people than we've ever seen before. American Idol season 10 premieres Wednesday, January 19 at 8/7c on Fox.

fundraisers and other political insiders surveyed by the nonpartisan National Journal, Mitch Daniels recently was chosen as the second-most-likely to get the GOP nomination, after Mitt Romney . Mike Pence didn't make the top 10. Mike Pence displays the kind of optimism, moral values and gutsy leadership we need in a president-- and a presidential nominee, says the draft-Pence website, theconservativechampion.org.`` He bridges the gap between the establishment and the grassroots,'' wrote influential conservative blogger Erick Erickson on RedState.com. The pro-plan union members avoid the streets and meet at an auditorium to listen to their leadership.`` The crisis has been under way for three years,'' the man on the podium says. Many industries are dying, banks are holding on to their money, if nothing improves, unemployment will skyrocket this year. We want to ensure our future. That's why we broke labor unity and approved the Sergio Marchionne plan. The union that's been left alone is the powerful left-leaning metal workers. If its members don't agree to sign, Sergio Marchionne says they will lose their representation rights on the factory floor.
